text:
これ vint に拾ってほしい

attachments.fallback: GitHub: Detect unwanted assigning to global variable at top-level by :for · Issue #354 · Vimjas/vint
attachments.title: Detect unwanted assigning to global variable at top-level by :for · Issue #354 · Vimjas/vint
attachments.text: I appreciate if vint catches this case. Should detect &quot; Implicit assigning to g:i by :for for i in range(3) endfor Should not detect if !exists(&#39;g:myplugin_enable_foo&#39;) let g:myplugin_...
